title: PES 2008 - ProEvoluti Superpatch 2.0
description:
Official patch site(contains pictures too): http://www.fifasoccer.info/pes6/modules.php?name=pes2008superpatch20

PROEVOLUTI SUPERPATCH 2.0


ProEvoluti Superpatch 2.0
complete patch for PES 2008 (pc)

Content:

Fixed all the names

Updated transfers, line ups and numbers to 4th february 2008

Created 20 teams: (Stuttgart, Werder Bremen,Schalke 04, Boca Juniors, Sao Paulo, Hamburger SV, LA Galaxy , Standard Liege, Bayer Leverkusen, CSKA Moskow, Slavia Prague, Shakhtar Donetsk, Borussia Dortmund, Zenit St.Peterburg, Steaua Bucuresti, Austria Wien, San Lorenzo, Flamengo, Nurnberg & Gremio)

Created all Premier League teams kits

Created all National teams kits

Created all the kits for the new teams

Updated all the kits that were without sponsors

Updated badges for Premier League teams

Created badges for the new teams

Updated Premier League badge

Unlocked all Classic teams

Created more than 100 faces

New boots

11 new balls

New turfs

New realistic nets

New Champions League adboards

New competitions&#039; logos

New chants for all the teams that have their own custom chants
